segments.text: Is this the A housing office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . Are you looking for housing for this semester ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was hoping to get into something on campus , but my friend told me that everything is full .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is , but I can put you on a waiting list , if you would like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please . And in the mean time , can I look at apartments available in the area from this office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , here is a catalog that is put out every year with locations that meet campus requirements for As .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who do I talk to if I want I to see some of them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The individual landlord's numbers are next to each entry . You can call them with any questions you may have .
segments.speaker: S2
